actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Military Forces and Personnel

official_title: To expand the mail-order pharmaceutical program of the Department of Defense to cover all members and former members of the uniformed services, and their dependents, who are eligible for health care in medical facilities of the uniformed services.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to operate a program to provide pharmaceuticals by mail to persons entitled or eligible for medical and dental care in facilities of the armed forces. Requires the recipient to pay postage costs.

titles.title: To expand the mail-order pharmaceutical program of the Department of Defense to cover all members and former members of the uniformed services, and their dependents, who are eligible for health care in medical facilities of the uniformed services.
